title: First Woody, then Harvey, now NBC: how Ronan Farrow became Hollywood's giant-slayer
text:
A few years ago, Ronan Farrow was known as Hollywood’s oddball ingenu. Possibly the love child of Frank Sinatra and Mia Farrow, legally the youngest biological child of Farrow and Woody Allen, he was something of a prodigy, racing through accomplishments – Yale Law School, Oxford’s Rhodes Scholarship, the Obama administration, Hillary Clinton’s office – like they were adolescent fads. He was known for his journalism, yes – but few expected Farrow to become the most feared man in Hollywood.

Yet today, with the release of his second book, that is what he has become. Two years after his groundbreaking, Pulitzer Prize-winning New Yorker investigation made public allegations of rape against Harvey...
description: A few years ago, Ronan Farrow was known as Hollywood’s oddball ingenu.
